allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(config\): use same-origin-allow-popups for COOP to fix OAuth

The same-origin COOP policy was breaking OAuth flows by severing
the connection between the app window and OAuth provider redirects.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
